title: 5v5 Ranked Team LFM
body:
Hello there guys,
iam in work to create a serious team,
Requirements and what we can offer:

-The team will pretty much play Everyday in the evenings so pls be rly active.
-Playtime is from 19oClock CET for atleast 3 Games
-Iam looking for Toplane, Midlane and Jungler.
-We will use Skype/TS for communication.
-be atleast 18years old
-Wish to be part of something more then just a grp of people who just play the same Game
-Play atleast 3hours aDay
-Dont be in BronzeElo
-Pls rly main the role u apply for 
-I will play some Normals with u to see how u behave in different situatuions and get used to your championpool.





if ur interrested pls apply here and/or addme ingame.

Strawhatya

replies.body:
I'm intersted in being part of your team .. i've also tried to found one but wasn't able to find enough motivated gamers. 
I am maining mid-lane, especially Ahri or Akali but im kinda able to play all champs. i've finished season 3 being in platin, yet im gold 3
also, im able to fullfill all your requirements .. im 18, active, i have skype and so on. i try to be patient and im able to take critzism.

im from Austria, and no native english speaker tho. but as i have learned english for eight years now i'm able to communicate without problems. im looking forward to your response.
